articles.title: बिहार में भीषण सड़क हादसा: कांवड़ियों से भरी पिकअप पलटी, दो की मौत और कई घायल, देवघर से लौट रहे थे
creator: सुधेंद्र प्रताप सिंह
articles.description: बिहार के बाढ़ अनुमंडल में एक बड़ा हादसा हुआ है। मोकामा थाना क्षेत्र के पास कांवड़ियों से भरी एक पिकअप वैन पलट गई। इस दुर्घटना में दो कांवड़ियों की मौके पर ही मौत हो गई। लगभग एक दर्जन लोग गंभीर रूप से घायल हो गए हैं। सभी कांवरिए देवघर से जल चढ़ाकर लौट रहे थे।

articles.title: Hollywood Nightclub accident: 30 injured after vehicle drives into waiting crowd in LA; driver shot by bystander | Watch
creator: Livemint, Garvit Bhirani
articles.description: At least 30 people were injured when a vehicle struck a crowd outside an East Hollywood nightclub. Seven were critically injured. The driver, believed to be intoxicated, was assaulted by bystanders and shot during the confrontation, according to police.

articles.description: *Sets 100-day action plan Excelsior Correspondent LEH, July 19: In his first high-level interaction with the administration since assuming office, Lieutenant Governor (LG) of Ladakh, Kavinder Gupta, convened an introductory meeting with the Administrative Secretaries, Directors and Heads of Departments (HoDs) of the Union Territory. articles.title: World News | Outrage in Eswatini as US Sends Foreign Convicts After Secret Deportation Deal
creator: ANI
articles.description: Get latest articles and stories on World at LatestLY. Five US deportees convicted of serious crimes were sent to Eswatini, sparking public outrage and regional concern. Critics say the US is using the small African nation as a dumping ground. Eswatini is holding the men in solitary confinement while working with the US and IOM on repatriation.

articles.title: Sonam Bajwa wraps Baaghi 4 shoot
creator: PTI
articles.description: Sonam Bajwa wrapped filming for "Baaghi 4," her second Hindi film, starring Tiger Shroff, Harnaaz Sandhu, and Sanjay Dutt. articles.title: France: Masked rioters unleashes violence on highway in Limoges, clashes with police
creator: FP News Desk
articles.description: A violent overnight attack in the French city of Limoges saw dozens of masked individuals armed with weapons clash with police and target vehicles on a major highway. Authorities suspect the incident, which left nine officers injured, was linked to a gang turf war.

articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent UDHAMPUR, July 19: As all the Safai Karamcharis, both permanent and temporary, are on indefinite strike for the last 18 days, the Udhampur town has virtually turned into a garbage dump. articles.title: 60 years of NSD Repertory: The learning stage
creator: Neelam Mansingh Chowdhry
articles.description: The NSD Repertory Company celebrated its 60th anniversary, reflecting on its history as a laboratory for Indian theatre. It fostered artistic inquiry, pushing boundaries with diverse plays and directors. Challenges include relevance, linguistic representation, and maintaining its experimental spirit amid shifting priorities and funding. The institution's continued contestation indicates its vitality.
